document.title: New Project Wizards
document.paragraph:
For the most part, EiffelEnvision New ../projects.xml Projects are autonomous, requiring no user interaction. This section of the documentation highlights the new EiffelEnvision projects that require interaction and hence furthre explaination.
in_this_section
2 In This Section
empty_project.xml Empty Project
Configurable empty project, with rudimentary options. For creating application or libraries by specifying the root class and creation routine.
blank_eiffel_graphical_application.xml Blank Eiffel Graphical Application
A standalone Windows application using the url*EiffelVision 2 platform independent graphical library.
windows_eiffel_application.xml Windows Eiffel Application
A standalone Windows application using the url*Windows Eiffel Library (WEL).
eiffel_class_library.xml Eiffel Class Library
Reusable class or component that can be shared with other projects, specifically designed for reuse by other EiffelEnvision projects. Eiffel Class Library projects are also known in Eiffel as ../../configuring/adding_references/precompiled_libraries.xmlPrecompiled Libraries.
